org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield
Class AngleBending

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield.AngleBending

public class AngleBending
extends java.lang.Object

Angle bending calculator for the potential energy function. Include function and derivatives.

Author:
vlabarta
Created on:
February 8, 2005
Belongs to CDK module:
forcefield
